title: LecRom Coaching
description: A professional coaching website with online payments (Stripe 3D Secure), FAQ, pricing plans, and a clean booking flow tailored for gym training.

title: Plantaneuse
description: A university teamwork project focused on creating a plant shop website. The main feature is a powerful search algorithm using TF-IDF to make finding plants fast and efficient. The goal was to build a highly performant and user-friendly platform.

title: Portfolio
description: A personal website to showcase all my projects and skills. It helps people learn more about my work and experience.

title: TodoLista
description: A task management app where users can add, edit, and delete tasks. It uses a PostgreSQL database to store tasks and has a clean design.

title: Ahkili
description: A web app where users can ask questions and get answers. It has a simple and user-friendly design that works well on all devices.

title: Calculator
description: A basic calculator app for simple math operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. It has a modern look and is easy to use.

title: TIC TAC TOE GAME
description: A simple Tic Tac Toe game where two players can play against each other. It has a clean design and is easy to understand.
